rukus.text: Ki tuhada bana'una zi'ada aukha hai jam akasa da, alaha ne usa nu bana'i'a
Usa di chata nu uca kita, phira usa nu thika kita
Phira usa di rata nu haneri bana'i'a ate usa de dina nu prakasavana kita
Ate usa tom ba'ada dharati nu phaila'i'a
Isa vicom usa da pani ate cara kadhi'a
Ate paharam nu sathapita kita
Tuhade la'i ate tuhade pasu'am la'i jivana samagari de rupa vica (paida kita)
Phira jadom uha vadi afata avegi
Jisa dina manukha apane kite nu yada karega
Ate dekhana vali'am de sahamane naraka pragata kara dita javega
Tam jisa ne sagavata kiti
Ate sasarika jivana nu pahila diti
Tam unham da tikana naraka honvega
Ate jihara bada apane raba de sahamane kharhe hona tom dari'a ate apane mana nu buri'am ichavam tom roki'a
Tam usa da tikana janata hovega
Uha ki'amata de sabadha vica puchade hana ki iha kadom vaparegi
Usa di caraca nala tuhada ki sabadha hai
Iha mamala tere raba nala sabadhita hai
Tam tusim sirafa usa bade nu dara'una vale ho, jihara dare
Jisa dina iha usa nu (tam ajiha khi'ala karanage) dekhanage tam jano uha sasara vica thahire hi nahim. Jivem (duni'am vica sirafa) ika sama jam ika savera batita kiti hove
